definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Wheat is a principle crop in Luliang.
sentences.chinese: 小麥是呂梁市的主要糧食作物之一。

sentences.english: Data of Grain Crops in this table are estimated from sample surveys.
sentences.chinese: 本表糧食作物均爲農產量抽樣調查數。

sentences.english: Spring wheat is one of the major crops in Heilongjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 小麥是黑龍江省主要糧食作物之一。

sentences.english: Using food crops to make fuel was a major point of debate.
sentences.chinese: 利用糧食作物製造燃料是會議的辯論重點之一。

sentences.english: Climate change threatens food crops across the world.
sentences.chinese: 氣候變化威脅着全世界的糧食作物。

sentences.english: The small brown rice planthopper is an injurious insect on food crop of Ningxia.
sentences.chinese: 灰飛蝨是寧夏糧食作物上的一大害蟲。

sentences.english: Windbreaks can be highly valuable for protecting grain crops.
sentences.chinese: 防風林在保護糧食作物方面極具價值。

sentences.english: Advances in deep-root food plants may trigger a new Green Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 深根糧食作物的生產有可以觸發新的農業革命。

sentences.english: The farmers will grow more cash crops next year instead of grains.
sentences.chinese: 明年農民將種植更多的經濟作物取代糧食作物。

sentences.english: White rice has become especially prevalent because of its long shelf life.
sentences.chinese: 白米飯已成爲普遍的糧食作物是因爲它的保質期長。

sentences.english: What are the main gain crops and industrial crops in Hei longjiang ?
sentences.chinese: 黑龍江省主要的糧食作物和經濟作物有哪些？

sentences.english: Sichuan is one of the big agriculture province in our country.
sentences.chinese: 四川是我國農業大省之一，水稻居其糧食作物的首位。

sentences.english: The winter wheat and the summer corn are the Guanzhong area most main grain crops.
sentences.chinese: 冬小麥和夏玉米是關中地區最主要的糧食作物。

sentences.english: So is the use of food crops to produce  biofuels.
sentences.chinese: 利用糧食作物生產生物燃料也是如此。

definition: (agriculture) to introduce a new plant variety
"kopi luwak" or civet coffee, made from coffee beans plucked from Asian palm civet's feces
